comment: Doesn't post any grades. You have to guess your grade the entire semester. Never emailed me back, doesn't care how you do on your exam. Doesn't want to help students. Don't waste your time with her. Get a different professor.

Its really not that hard, participate, read in preparation for quizzes and come to class. She isn't a hard grader at all, but I suggest you go to the writing center, they will email her and she may be more lenient grading your paper just because she knows you looked for help.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Dr. Williams really likes class participation and tries very hard to make it fun. She doesn't like just lecturing and wants to bring everyone into the conversation. Her grading is tough and there are no tests. 3 quizzes, a project, 3 focus essays a final that is emailed to her.

there is a lot of reading in her class i get so sick of it. and the citations have to be so specific. i'm trying really hard to get an A but she shows no mercy when grading grammar. she does love to teach though
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: I loved this class, Professor Williams is very funny and helpful.  Her lectures are very interesting and if you did bad on a paper she would let you re-write it.  Tons of reading though...

There are no reviews so I figure I'd be the first. Ms. Joni is okay as a person but as a teacher SHE IS TOUGH! I like english but I hated taking her class. She takes herself way too seriously. She has this dry humor and it feels like the class drags on! She assigns SOOO many assignments and makes it harder than what it should be. Take someone else.
